memberdef.name: indices_sum

detaileddescription.para:
Function that returns, for an input i0, i2 in 0...15, the two Keldysh indices of the left [0] and right [1] vertices of a bubble in a given channel.
i0
: Keldysh index of the lhs of a derivative equation for the vertex
i2
: Keldysh index of the non-zero components of the bubble propagators (takes values in a set of size 9)
channel
: channel of the bubble
: Vector of two Keldysh indices for the left [0] and right [1] vertex in a bubble
